Bilateral myringotomies.context: Bilateral myringotomies, placement of ventilating tubes, nasal endoscopy, and adenoidectomy.

Recurrent acute otitis media.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 1. Recurrent acute otitis media, bilateral middle ear effusions. 2. Chronic rhinitis. 3. Recurrent adenoiditis with adenoid hypertrophy.

bilateral middle ear effusions.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 1. Recurrent acute otitis media, bilateral middle ear effusions. 2. Chronic rhinitis. 3. Recurrent adenoiditis with adenoid hypertrophy.

acute purulent adenoiditis.context: nasal endoscopy was carried out, and evidence of acute purulent adenoiditis was evident in spite of the fact that clinically the patient has shown some modest improvement following cessation of all milk products.

serous material.context: Then, a modest amount of serous and a trace of mucoid material encountered that was evacuated.

mucoid material.context: Then, a modest amount of serous and a trace of mucoid material encountered that was evacuated.

Ciprodex drops.context: Ciprodex drops were instilled. Ciprodex will be planned for two postoperative days as well.

Augmentin.context: Discharge anticipated later in the day on Augmentin 400 mg twice daily, Lortab or Tylenol p.r.n. for pain.

culture.context: Parents were instructed to call, however, regarding the outcome of the culture on Monday next week to ensure adequate antibiotic coverage before cessation of the antibiotic.
